entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Ice fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
